title: So....Ao Shin?
body:
Ao Shin was predicted to come out last year and I forget who but one of you fellas at the Rito said he will be pushed till later....

It is now 2016 and we have a whole year ahead. Will he possibly be making an appearance this year and are there any updates we can get on him? He looks like he'd be a really fun champ to play and since I learned of his existence I've been kinda hyped to play him so I'm just wonderin'.

Shyvana needs another dragon buddy

replies.body: To activate Ao Shin someone in Runeterra would have to collect the 7 mystic artifacts and say the magic phrase to summon Him. It is said that who ever collects these mystic artifacts and summons Him shall be granted one wish....
Time to main Bard and go on a Magical Journey to find dat shit

Probably not gonna happen 'till maybe next year. 
I got shut down by a Rioter himself.

_Always gotta remember Gnar hops, not jumps..._
When was the last time riot gave any updates on Ao Shin? Last I heard he was being pushed into early 2016, which is now. I, for one, am hype.
They weren't satisfied with his kit as it wasn't awesome enough, so they scrapped his kit and are building from the ground up.
He is too long of a champion.

> Shyvana needs another dragon buddy

Or another fan ship, maybe make J4 a little jealous.
